channel.title: Global objects
channel.description: ok ive moved my servers start place away from varrock, but wenever i try to add global objects i.e dummys ,haybales ect the wont show up except haybals, ive compiled and their in the right coords,and i also cant turn the hay bales any1 know wats wrong?

item.title: Global objects
item.dc:creator: @mr_dharok mr dharok
item.description:
@mr_dharok wrote:

[code]public void NewObjects() {
AddGlobalObject(3004, 3383, 2469, 0, 10);//portal
AddGlobalObject(2606, 3163, 5162, -3, 10); // Fighter Torso Minigame
AddGlobalObject(2911, 3614, 4090, -3, 10);//flaming fire alter
AddGlobalObject(2911, 3611, 2469, 0, 10);//portal
AddGlobalObject(2913, 3609, 2153, 0, 10);//fire ob

AddGlobalObject(2910, 3619, 2153, 0, 10);//fire ob
AddGlobalObject(3281, 2765, 2107, 0, 10);//rune rock in mine – mining
AddGlobalObject(3285, 2767, 2091, 0, 10);//copper rock in mine – mining
AddGlobalObject(3285, 2768, 2091, 0, 10);//copper rock in mine – mining
AddGlobalObject(3277, 2767, 2094, 0, 10);//tin rock in mine – mining
AddGlobalObject(3285, 2771, 2092, 0, 10);//iron rock in mine – mining

AddGlobalObject(3285, 2773, 2102, 0, 10);//mith rock in mine – mining
AddGlobalObject(3285, 2774, 2102, 0, 10);//mith rock in mine – mining
AddGlobalObject(3277, 2773, 2105, 0, 10);//addy rock in mine – mining
AddGlobalObject(3277, 2774, 2105, 0, 10);//addy rock in mine – mining
AddGlobalObject(3251, 3439, 411, -2, 10);//altar
AddGlobalObject(3086, 3492, 2728, -1, 10);//range

            AddGlobalObject(2896, 3560, 4032, 1, 10);//dummy(attack)<wont show
            AddGlobalObject(2901, 3559, 299, -1, 10);//hay (defense)
            AddGlobalObject(2899, 3559, 1531, -1, 10);//door (strength) <wont show

[/code]
